description: This file defines routing endpoints for authentication-related operations such as signup, login, logout, token refresh, and fetching current user profile within an Express.js application. It also includes Swagger API documentation comments.

methods.name: signup
methods.description: Handles user registration, creating a new user account with email and password.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Handles user authentication, verifying credentials and issuing tokens.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Handles user logout, revoking session tokens.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Refreshes access tokens using provided refresh tokens.

methods.name: me
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user's profile.
